# Station Alert - Omicron
[italic]Called by: Central Command Only.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
Central Command has decided to take direct control of the station.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
All security members are to de-arm and await further instructions from Central Command.
[bold]Secure Areas:[/bold]
All Secure Areas are to be bolted down.
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All personnel must maximise their suit sensors.
All personnel should remain in their department, and await further orders.
Personnel are required to follow all Central Command orders.
